page.title: 06HUMSHAUGH TRADE
page.content: THE MAIN TRADING POINTS LIE IN THE VILLAGE CENTRE WITH A{GENERAL STORE AND{POST OFFICE. }AFTER A GRADUAL DECLINE, THE GENERAL STORE CHANGED OWNERSHIP ABOUT 1 YEAR AGO AND IS NOW MAKING STEADY BUSINESS PARTICULARLY ON DAILY NEWSPAPERS, OVER 230 BEING SOLD DAILY - THE MOST POPULAR BEING THE JOURNAL. A PAPER DELIVERY SERVICE IS PROVIDED ON A SUNDAY ONLY BY LOCAL BOYS. THE POST OFFICE IS STABLE AND IS WIDELY USED PARTICULARLY BY PENSIONERS. PREVIOUSLY THERE WAS ALSO A BUTCHER BUT ON CHANGING TO A DELICATESSEN 3 YEARS AGO IT BARELY LASTED 6 MONTHS. OTHER TRADE INCLUDES A PHARMACY, TIED IN WITH THE LOCAL SURGERY, A GARAGE ON THE CHOLLERFORD ROUNDABOUT INCLUDING PRIVATE COACH HIRE AND{TRAVELLING SHOPS}BOTH FISH, GROCERIES AND VEGETABLES.
